## Storage

Store leftovers for up to 3 days in the fridge in an airtight container.

## Lisa's notes

Very walnutey, very mapley! The Moosewood cookbooks Maple Walnut Pie looks to be based on this one. Featured in Maple Industry museum exhibits!
